item.description: I’m Pavan, a software and technology enthusiast who spent over 13 years building applications for Governments (Lake County Indiana, various NYC city agencies), SMEs (Cenifax Courts), not-for-profit organizations (Horizon BCBS) and multinationals (AT&T, Palo Alto Networks), having advised across their eGovernance, eCommerce, Finance, Insurance, Telecom and Cloud security practices. I’ve built, shipped and maintained production quality products for various clients; worked on hard problems with some exceptionally bright people and have that experience to draw upon.
